General.Name: Blue Square Real Estate Ltd
General.Description: Blue Square Real Estate Ltd develops, owns, leases, manages, and sells real estate properties in Israel. It offers retail, commercial, office, and logistic, as well as residential properties. The company was incorporated in 2005 and is based in Tel Aviv-Yafo, Israel. Blue Square Real Estate Ltd is a subsidiary of Alon Blue Square Israel Ltd.
General.Address: The Round Tower K, Tel Aviv, Israel, 6701101
